name: Defense Evasion - System Checks (T1497.001)
description: Detects attempts to detect virtualization or sandbox by checking for specific drivers, processes, registry keys, or hardware artifacts.
author: Wahid Hendrawan
query: process.args:(*VBoxService* OR *vmtoolsd* OR *qemu-ga* OR *vboxguest* OR *hypervisor_present* OR *Win32_ComputerSystem* OR *system manufacturer* OR *bios version*)
